title: Best of 2021
desc: Karu's Best of 2021 montage is out! Huge thanks to everyone in the community who helped make this an amazing year <3

title: Monday Night Blitz
desc: The TA Community Hub is bringing back Monday night blitz! 9pm-Midnight EST, Pubstyle. Come hang out in the Community Hub Discord server if you wanna chat or organise teams. See the link below for more info.

title: NA PUGs Every Sunday
desc: The TA Community Hub is now running North American Pick-up Games from 9pm EDT every Sunday. These are competitive 7v7 CTF matches with all weapons enabled and no heavy limit. See the link below for more info.

title: TACH Purchases Wilderzone.org
desc: Remember wilderzone.org? Well the Tribes Ascend Community Hub has just bought the 'wilderzone.org' domain name! Plans to restore the original website are in the works.

title: Best of 2021 Submissions Still Open
desc: Karu is making another Best of Year montage! Send in your clips ASAP if you'd like to be featured.

title: New Wilderzone Live Website
desc: Phew! A fresh new look with a much better purpose. Welcome to the new and improved Wilderzone Live. Thanks to everyone for your patience :)

title: Wilderzone Servers Portal
desc: This project has been in the works for a long time, and now it's finally here. Introducing Wilderzone Servers - allowing you to easily check who's online and what servers are active.

title: UAE Phoenix Tournament Postponed
desc: Unfortunately, the UAE Summer Phoenix tournament has been postponed while organizers respond to feedback from the community. Thanks to everyone for being supportive. An update will be posted when the tournament series returns.

title: UAE Ascension Tournament Results
desc: With the completion of the first tournament in the UAE Alpha Circuit, the results are now live!

title: Launcher Update
desc: The TA Mods team has been hard at work, and this Friday they released TLS version 2.0.0! This version now includes a built-in package downloader for downloading new maps and assets.
